name: Tamas Awakening (itch)
description:
Hello, we are Whiteleaf studio and we are creating adult games (+18) for everyone. If you feel generous, leave a contribution and support us, it's very important.

Tamas Awakning, our first game, is an erotic game about corruption and the limits of power. What would happen if someone naturally evil got almost unlimited power? Well, play it and find out. Fetishes include corruption/mindbreak, vanilla, BDSM, impregnation, exhibitionism and some other taboos.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/whiteleafstudio
